message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12,000 is too low. Could you do $17,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $14,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
